item.description:
Celebrate with us at an event that is becoming an annual tradition- a special Pre-Thanksgiving dinner inside the private room at the Lansdowne Pub. This is a popular event and it is a ton of fun! The Pub creates a special menu just for us and it is delicious! After dinner, we typically head over to Jillian's for some more drinks and fun.

Below is the menu:

Roasted Turkey w/Gravy

Apple Sausage Stuffing

Roasted Acorn Squash

Mashed Potatoes

Honey Roasted Carrots

House Made Cranberry Sauce

Warm Apple Crumble Cake w/ Whipped Cream

Dinner costs $30 per person (including tax/tip). There  is a cash bar.  Since the Pub is creating this menu just for our group, I need to give the Pub a headcount no later than Friday, November 9 and I have to sign a contract with the venue. All guests must pay in advance (no exceptions!) via PayPal in order to reserve your spot. Please do not wait because there will be no reservations taken after 3pm on Friday, November 9. Please note that there will be an additional $3 service charge when you pay because of PayPal fees.

This is always a fun night, we look forward to seeing you!

Refund policy. There will be NO refunds issued after 3pm on November 9.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the large private room. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Special Pre-Thanksgiving Dinner at the Lansdowne Pub
